meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time
meanings.sent1: The coetaneous arrival of the guests made the party lively.
meanings.sent2: The meeting started at 3 pm, and the coetaneous presentation began promptly.
meanings.sent3: The coetaneous timing of the twins' birthdays always led to joint celebrations.
meanings.sent4: The coetaneous launch of the new products boosted sales instantly.
meanings.sent5: The coetaneous sunrise and bird songs created a peaceful morning atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Of the same age or duration
meanings.sent1: The coetaneous siblings shared a special bond growing up together.
meanings.sent2: The trees in the forest were coetaneous, showing their long history.
meanings.sent3: The coetaneous vintage cars lined up for the classic car show.
meanings.sent4: Their coetaneous friendship stood the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The coetaneous buildings in the historic district reflected the town's heritage.
